Uninstall SimNIBS¶

Windows¶

You can find the uninstaller in Add or Remove Programs

Linux¶

Run the uninstall simnibs script, located in the SimNIBS installation directory, by default /home/<USERNAME>/SimNIBS

Linux¶

Run the uninstall simnibs script, located in the SimNIBS installation directory, by default /Users/<USERNAME>/Applications/SimNIBS.app
